categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In 3 ABY, after escaping Imperial forces at the Battle of Hoth, the Sixth Division of the Rebel Alliance's fleet was destroyed. The cell was discovered by Commander Ellian Zahra, who was able to locate the rebels with the help of a signal analysis protocol she had developed. Zahra's flagship, the Tarkin's Will, decimated the Sixth Division, destroying all ships and leaving no survivors.
The destruction of the Sixth Division first appeared in Star Wars 3, written by Charles Soule and released on February 26, 2020.
